text: The Colombian lesserblack tarantulaCommon Names of Arachnids, American Arachnological Society (2003) (Xenesthis immanis) is a species of tarantula. They are from Colombia. It is from 6â€“7 cm. Its length width is from 19-22 cm. It usually has a commensal or mutualistic relationship with the frog Chiasmocleis ventrimaculata.Reginald B. Cocroft and Keith Hambler, "Observations on a Commensal Relationship of the Microhylid Frog Chiasmocleis ventrimaculata and the Burrowing Theraphosid Spider Xenesthis immanis in Southeastern Peru", Biotropica Vol. 21 No. 1 (1989) == References == Category:Mygalomorphae Category:Animals of South America
title: Colombian lesserblack tarantula
